channel.title: Port forward on a wireless router?
channel.description: Ok, I've been at making a server for a long time now and I'm sick of it. On runelocus I heard someone talk about if they can portforward on a wireless router and they said things like it was tough or they gave up. It didn't really answer the question very well. I have the WRT54G wireless router and hoping if anyone has the guide to portforward with it. Been stuck on this forever. If you add me on msn n0vak0@hotmail.com I would appreciate it :]

item.title: Port forward on a wireless router?
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0

Ok, I’ve been at making a server for a long time now and I’m sick of it. I have the WRT54G wireless router and hoping if anyone has the guide to portforward with it. Been stuck on this forever. If you add me on msn n0vak0@hotmail.com I would appreciate it :]
